alert.note: Alert for Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 17 at 8:52PM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of up to 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Sheboygan county. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include: Vollrath Park in Sheboygan... Deland Park Beach in Sheboygan... Blue Harbor Beach in Sheboygan...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
